meanings.definition: A group or set of four people or things.
meanings.sent1: The quaternity of friends went on a picnic together.
meanings.sent2: The quaternity of seasons includes spring, summer, fall, and winter.
meanings.sent3: At the party, there was a quaternity of siblings who all wore matching outfits.
meanings.sent4: The quaternity of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The quaternity of books on the shelf caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fourfold.
meanings.sent1: The quaternity of flavors in the dish made it truly unique.
meanings.sent2: The quaternity of sides on the square made it a perfect shape.
meanings.sent3: The quaternity of petals on the flower gave it a beautiful symmetry.
meanings.sent4: The quaternity of elements in the recipe balanced the taste perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The quaternity of wheels on the bicycle ensured a smooth ride.

meanings.definition: A group of four elements or principles.
meanings.sent1: The quaternity of elements in nature is earth, water, air, and fire.
meanings.sent2: The quaternity of virtues includes honesty, kindness, courage, and humility.
meanings.sent3: In the story, the wizard possessed a quaternity of magical powers.
meanings.sent4: The quaternity of ingredients in the potion created a powerful effect.
meanings.sent5: The quaternity of rules in the game made it challenging yet fun.
